Reviews.Title: Cameras
Reviews.Author: Bob A.
Reviews.Content: Work great so far. No issues. Low profile and very good picture for low end cameras. Great value for what you get.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3" color CCD image sensor, NTSC signal system. 480 TV Lines
Built-in 20 infrared LEDs for night vision. 0 Lux
Weather-resistant casing for indoor and outdoor use. Vandal armor design protects the camera
Built in f 3.6mm Lens for wide view angle
Package included: 4 x CCD cameras, 4 x 12 V DC power supplies, 4 x security warning stickers
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu 4 of Color CCD Outdoor CCTV Dome Security Cameras Wide Angle Infrared Day Night Vision Vandal Proof 20 IR LEDs Home Surveillance with Free Power Supplies and Security Warning Decals MD7
